title: Property aspect-ratio
content: Hi Mozilla, I have a problem with the aspect-ratio css property. I am a Frontend Jr Dev, how can I manually enable it in the app? Can't you enable aspect-ratio for all Firefox versions as it is a useful CSS property? Thanks Happy Easter
creator: alessiodiasp

title: Separate Start and Home Pages
content:
Hallo,

My previous thread was archived, but further regression has occurred so I'll bring it up here again as feature requests are down. I'm still using 56 one reason being that there are separate control options for the start page and the home page. I like to start with a blank page, but have the home button available for my #1 destination. The current version of firefox combines start and home pages, thus taking away my options to separate these elements. For a while it wasn't in the GUI, but you could fix it in the about:config (which was my previous "solution"), but with the latest updates this has been removed as well.

How do I get separate start and home pages? If I could assign a value to the home icon that didn't affect the start page, that would work too. 

         Tak!
creator: matieusinjon

title: symbolic link for places.sqlite respect
content:
Hallo,

I have two firefox profiles with which I wish to share bookmarks. An easy solution is to create a symbolic link replacing the one places.sqlite file with a link to the file in the other profile, thus we're always just using one set of bookmarks and all is happy. However, Firefox keeps overriding my link; labeling the file "corrupt" and replacing it with a cached version. I need to know how to stop firefox from overriding my input and respect the changes made in the profile folder. I need to disable whatever mechanism is going on that is checking the files and reconstituting them. 

                                Tak!
creator: matieusinjon

title: Image information on webside not possible
content:
Ich kann keine Bildinformationen mehr abrufen bei Klick mit rechter Maustaste ins Bild. Die war bisher immer möglich gewesen.

Danke

E. Palm


Translation I can no longer call up any image information on a website by clicking the image with the right mouse button. So far it was always possible.

Thanks for answer

E. Palm

title: Firefox version 87
content: Why in the New Tabs control is the only option "Firefox Home (default)" or "Blank Page". Up until this version I have always been able to set it to my preferred search engine home page.

title: Is there a known compatability issue with Parler.com?
content: Parler extracts graphics from links just fine But when i try to load graphics from my computer, Parler indicates and error with firefox processing the photo/graphic. Can we get this fixed?
creator: DonMashak

title: Are there known compatability issues with Trumpbook.com
content: I often get error messages that Firefox can't process that video or graphic. And then it goes on to display my post but with a "broken photo" graphic instead of my graphic with firefox included on the graphic. Can we get this issue fixed?
creator: DonMashak

title: Are there known compatability issues with GAB.com?
content: I accessed Gab.com with Firefox for years. Then they were attacked by BigTech and went down for a while. When they came back up, I could not access with firefox. I gave up on recovering my old account. Then it struck me to try on MS Edge. I could not recover my old account but I could start a new account. But I hate going back to MS Edge for just Gab.com Is this a known issue? Can We fix this issue? When I try to access GAB.com from firefox, I get an error message to the effect, "You don't have permission to access that page" Thank you in advance for your help?
creator: DonMashak

title: History page - search bar
content: So my firefox used to have nice history tab and I could just with 2 quick clicks get into my whole search history and it had search bar but with recent update they removed it for no reason and I am really sad about it. I know that trough about:config you can do a lot with your browser So is there a chance to fix this ?

creator: psri6215

title: Go back button does not work on Microsoft forums or support web pages
content:
When I open a Microsoft forum or support web page, scroll up and down the page, the go back button on Firefox does not work. I have to press the button twice quickly to go back to the previous page.

Please try this link: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/march-29-2021-kb5000842-os-builds-19041-906-and-19042-906-preview-1a58a276-6a0a-47a5-aa7d-97af2d10b16d

Block pop-up windows on Firefox is unchecked (disabled). I don't have any third party security program on my system. I use Windows Defender. No such issue on Chrome and Edge.
creator: s-malik

title: Excessive RAM usage
content: Lately almost every time I use Firefox, RAM usage goes up to 5 GB, CPU usage goes to 100%, and my PC becomes unusable until I kill Firefox processes and wait 5 - 10 minutes for virtual RAM to be cleared out of disk and disk usage to return to normal. This is much worse since the last update, basically making Firefox unusable. Is anyone working on fixes so Firefox doesn't need 5 GB of RAM to open one simple web article?
creator: KennonConrad
